data.message: Phase 2 Waiver Dashboard: Created generate_waiver_dashboard.py (259 lines) that reads scoreboard and outputs WAIVERS_DASHBOARD.md with: 7d summary, top rules table, 14d ASCII trend chart, recent waivers list, and rule burst detection (3+ same rule in 24h). Updated CI to generate dashboard, upload as 90d artifact, and auto-commit on scheduled runs only. Commit 99a6327 pushed.
data.outcome: Created generate_waiver_dashboard.py (259 lines) that reads scoreboard and outputs WAIVERS_DASHBOARD.md with: 7d summary, top rules table, 14d ASCII trend chart, recent waivers list, and rule burst detection (3+ same rule in 24h). Updated CI to generate dashboard, upload as 90d artifact, and auto-commit on scheduled runs only. Commit 99a6327 pushed.
